entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
